channel.title: Black screen
channel.description: Okay, so when you first open the client, when its supposed to start to download the cache, it black screens you. The cache downloads and after it downloads you can play, but people will think the client isn't working so I want to get this fixed. Help please

item.title: Black screen
item.dc:creator: @anthonyarggg anthonyarggg
item.description:
@anthonyarggg wrote:

you dont have the loading screen coded in/ in your cache
